籤詩版本二:
Yade yamtengo wapatali ndi chuma chobisika mwalacho chimangofunidwa ndi alendo ochokera kumadera ena.
Mofanana ndi kugwira nyali pofunafuna moto, ndi bwino kuyeretsa zimene zawonongekazo
詩意:
Hexagram iyi imakhala ndi nyali ndikuyang'ana chizindikiro cha moto.
Zonse zidzakwaniritsidwa panthawi yake.
解曰: Msonkhano waukwati. Palibe chimene chingachitidwe. Ziyenera kukhala zopanda malire. Ndizowona pamaso panga.
籤詩故事一:
◇Pang Juan akuwona mapangidwewo
Munthawi ya Nkhondo za States, Sun Bin anali mbadwa ya Qi. Pang Juan anali mbadwa ya Wei. Ankalambiranso Gui Guzi monga mphunzitsi wake.
Sun Bin adaphunzira bwino kuposa Pang Juan, ndipo Pang Juan adakhala wamkulu wa Wei. Anamenyana ndi Sun Bin pankhondo yanzeru, ndipo atalephera, adadana ndi Sun Bin.
Anagwiritsa ntchito chinyengo kuti amudule mapazi a Sun Bin, kenako Sun Bin anakhala ngati wamisala ndipo anatha kuthawa.
Mfumu Wei ya Qi idagwiritsa ntchito Sun Bin ngati mlangizi wake wankhondo kutsogolera asitikali kuti akaukire Wei.
Pang Juan anapita ku msasa wa Sun Bin kuti akawone momwe asilikali akuyendera. Sun Bin ananyenga Pang Juan ponamizira kuchepetsa asilikali ake ndi kuwonjezera asilikali ambiri mwachinsinsi. Pang Juan adamuthamangira ku Maling Road ndipo adaphedwa ndi msilikali wobisalira ndi uta.
(Fanizo la nkhaniyi ndi lakuti inunso muli ndi luso, ndiye n’chifukwa chiyani muyenera kuchita nsanje ndi luso lake?)
聖意: Kunyumba sikuli kwabwino kwa iwe mwini, kumavuta kupeza ndalama, kugulitsa malonda, zovuta kukwatira, kumavuta kwa mkazi wapaulendo kusuntha minda, mphutsi za silika, Qiuji, ndi ziweto zisanu ndi chimodzi, ndi zovuta kupeza munthu, kupezedwa, kuimbidwa mlandu, kusamukira ku nyumba yakale, kutayika, kudwala, kuikidwa m'manda amapiri.
